title: New rune idea: Quintessence of tenacity
body: Tenacity is a muched loved stat by every single champion but it is kind of limited to tanks currently, because it is offered from the swiftness mastery in the tank tree, merc trends and the elixir of iron. with quints of tenacity it would help would be useful on every champion and would be a very good rune to use

replies.body: Would be better to bring back zephyr

> [{quoted}](name=Eimer Troll,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=J8iNyKko,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-13T09:33:36.250+0000)
>
> Would be better to bring back zephyr

PREACH 6 ZEPHYRS ON LITERALLY ANY MARKSMAN WAS HILARIOUS

You woudn't get much from the rune if they did bring it back or it'd be the dodge scenario all over again. Like could you imagine irellia with 5 per Quint + her passive + the masteries like a 2 second stun would translate into a 0.1 second stun on her in a teamfight. Not to mention you'd really only rune those Runes on Tanks or Bruisers it'd just be better to bring in an item with tenacity on it. I hate the DMG reduction on Phantom dancer it should be like 15% tenacity rather than 12% dmg reduction
